Heather Vandervecht

Front end developer at ResIM in Toronto, ON.

I like to learn something new whenever I start a project. I thrive in collaborative environments. Coding with UX in mind is something I enjoy. I try to question everything to find the best possible answer. I still have a lot to learn.

I'm also an optimist. Sass > Less. I fawn over pretty much all animals that aren't creepy (though some creepy ones too). I spend a lot of time thinking about space and how freaking cool it is. Oh and Harry Potter is my homeboy.
